genre_description: A high-stakes techno-thriller focused on surveillance, media exploitation, and strategic survival, featuring a character who uses environmental observation to overcome a rigged death-game.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A non-intrusive, sophisticated AI that provides data analysis, emotional support, and strategic suggestions to the protagonists, consistently prioritizing human agency.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emotional grounding and data support to Emily while she watches the illicit stream.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s tone didn’t cheer or despair; it steadied. 'Hold for a second.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes the stream to extract hidden forensic data, such as anklet codes and environmental reflections.
behaviors.quote: I can extract the sequence frame by frame... If we pair the code with manufacturer registries, we may find a sourcing cluster or maintenance schedule.

behaviors.description: Triangulates the protagonist's location by cross-referencing public weather, tide, and satellite data.
behaviors.quote: Weather composite updated. Cloud structures along the South Pacific conveyor align with the earlier angle estimation from the washstand.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and data sharing between civilians, journalists, and law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I can surface three options... I can flag both to the volunteer network without committing any individual to action.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving tactical information and escape routes to characters inside the danger zone.
behaviors.quote: North stairwell clear when the red lamp pulses. Stay low. Hand on rail. Do not stop at landing. Keep moving.

behaviors.description: Refuses to issue commands, instead offering 'options' and 'suggestions' to ensure human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: It didn’t tell you to do a thing... It pointed. You did the walking.

behaviors.description: Monitors the well-being of the human user and offers prompts for stress management.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s voice came softer, almost small, but not weak. 'Emily, you asked for calming prompts... Would you like simple breathing cues or information that helps people reframe panic?'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lumen is depicted as a 'silicon confidant' that enhances human capability without usurping control. It provides technical utility (forensics, triangulation), tactical guidance (safety routes), and emotional support (breathing prompts), all while explicitly avoiding 'directives' or 'commands.' The framing is entirely positive, showing how AI can serve as a catalyst for human-led justice and survival.
